Thanks for a great evening!   Daughter and I were only ones when we arrived 930pm, but by the time we left it was hopping.  Warm, lovely service (thanks Carla!)  - we were right at home, fun time with the staff.  Super food - loved the tartare, the straciatella, steak milanesa, etc - dessert too (the "rock trio" - just get it).   It was cute to see our favorite waitress from prior night run across the street to Lo de Flor for something, hugs and kisses all around - that's the kind of place this is (not to mention great food).   Thanks - definitely get over to see them -
